According to #p2012018#, #p2111005# isn't a 100% Fairy, but rather half human, half Fairy, which is the reason why the Fairy medicine doesn't really work for #p2111005#... #p2012018# decided to up the potency and asked me to get #b10 #t4000068#s#k and #b100 #t4000061#s#k. 

#i4000068##t4000068# #b#c4000068##k/10 
#i4000061##t4000061# #b#c4000061##k/100
Once I got him all the ingredients, #p2012018# told me to wait as he made a new batch of medicine.
키니는 요정이 아니야. 아니, 정확히 말하면 완전한 요정이 아니라고 할 수 있지. 그 애는 인간과의 혼혈이니까. 그렇기 때문에 요정을 위한 약이 잘 듣지 않아. 별로 좋은 선택은 아니지만... 하는 수 없지. 좀 더 강력한 약을 써봐야겠어. 이번에도 도와주겠지?
그럼 페어리의 더듬이 20개와 러스터픽시의 태양조각 50개를 구해다 줘. 조금 너무 강력할 것 같아서 걱정이긴 하지만... 그래도 어쩔 수 없지. 그 정도는 되어야 약이 효과가 있을 것 같으니...
치사하게 여기까지 와서 안 할 생각이야? 너무하다고 생각 안해?

For #p2111005#, regular medicine would not work for her. That's because she's not 100% Fairy. She's half human, half Fairy. That's why the medicine for Fairies don't really work for her. Not quite the best of both worlds, know what I mean?
I know this may be unwise, but...there's no other way. I think I'll have to raise the potency of the medicine. You'll help me this time, too, right?

Then please get me #b10 #t4000068#s#k and #b100 #t4000061#s#k. It's so potent that it usually isn't used on a young kid like #p2111005#, but... there's nothing else we can do at this point. I think it's the only way we may be able to save her.
You came all the way back, and now you don't want to do it? Don't you think that's just wrong?
Good, you brought everything. Now just wait for a bit, as I make a new batch for my niece...
I don't think you got all the ingredients yet. Did you forget it already? I need #b10 #t4000068#s#k and #b100 #t4000061#s#k.
